main_definition: To start or initiate something, such as an action, process, event, period of time, etc.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Starting a physical activity or task
meanings_and_examples.example: She began her workout with some stretching exercises.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Initiating the start of an event or occurrence
meanings_and_examples.example: The concert will begin at 7 PM sharp, so make sure to arrive early.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Commencing a new period of time or phase in life
meanings_and_examples.example: They began their college education after high school.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Starting something from scratch, often used when referring to building or creating something
meanings_and_examples.example: He began constructing his own computer by assembling individual components.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Beginning a series of steps in an algorithm or process
meanings_and_examples.example: The first step is to begin collecting data for the research study.
